item.title: Colleen add a quote by PJ Haarsma
item.description: "Fear Nothing" OIO Key" -- PJ Haarsma

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Life is a journey. Time is a river. The door is ajar" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Paranoid? Probably. But just because you're paranoid doesn't mean there isn't an invisible demon about to eat your face." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching -- they are your family. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by mark twain
item.description: "Reader, suppose you were an idiot. And suppose you were a member of Congress. But I repeat myself." -- mark twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "In a good bookroom you feel in some mysterious way that you are absorbing the wisdom contained in all the books through your skin, without even opening them." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Wrinkles should merely indicate where the smiles have been." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "God created war so that Americans would learn geography." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Life is short, Break the Rules. Forgive quickly, Kiss SLOWLY. Love truly. Laugh uncontrollably And never regret ANYTHING That makes you smile." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Out of all the things I have lost, I miss my mind the most." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The only difference between a tax man and a taxidermist is that the taxidermist leaves the skin." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Every time you stop a school, you will have to build a jail. What you gain at one end you lose at the other. It's like feeding a dog on his own tail. It won't fatten the dog." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "When I am king they shall not have bread and shelter only, but also teachings out of books, for a full belly is little worth where the mind is starved." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If books are not good company, where shall I find it?" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Every person is a book, each year a chapter," -- Mark Twain

item.title: Colleen add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear." -- John Lennon

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Richard Castle
item.description: "There are two kinds of folks who sit around thinking about how to kill people: psychopaths and mystery writers." -- Richard Castle

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Richard Castle
item.description: "I really am ruggedly handsome, aren't I?" -- Richard Castle

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "If you look for perfection, you'll never be content." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Seanan McGuire
Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "Evil isn’t the real threat to the world. Stupid is just as destructive as Evil, maybe more so, and it’s a hell of a lot more common. What we really need is a crusade against Stupid. That might actually make a difference." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "There are bad things in the world. There's no getting away from that. But that doesn't mean nothing can be done about them. You can't abandon life just because it's scary, and just because sometimes you get hurt. " -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I let out a battle cry. Sure, a lot of people might have mistaken it for a sudden yelp of unmanly fear, but trust me. It was a battle cry." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Colleen add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "There’s nothing that makes you more insane than family. Or more happy. Or more exasperated. Or more . . . secure." -- Jim Butcher
